types.description: Object describing the options used for speech recognition.

language.description: BCP-47 language code of the language to recognize. When set to 'auto' or not defined defaults to user's most preferred content language. Will use 'en-US' if not supported or invalid.

grammar.description: Name of the grammar to use. Defaults to 'builtin:dictation'.

filterProfanities.description: Enable or disable profanity filtering. Will use the default Chrome filtering settings if not set.

types.description: Object describing a speech input error.
Object describing a speech recognition hypothesis.

confidence.description: Confidence of the hypothesis. Rated from 0 (lowest) to 1 (highest).

hypotheses.description: Array of zero or more objects describing the stable candidate hypotheses sorted by decreasing likelihood.

functions.name: start
functions.description: Request to start recording as a new speech recognition session.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options used for this speech recognition session.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Called when the speech recognition session has successfully started recording.

functions.name: stop
functions.description: Request to stop an ongoing speech recognition session.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Called when the audio recording has stopped and any pending recognition results have been completed.

functions.name: isRecording
functions.description: Determine if audio recording is currently in process in Chrome, not limited to this API.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: Flag set to true if recording is in process in Chrome, false otherwise.

events.name: onError
events.description: Called in case of an error in speech recognition.

events.name: onSoundStart
events.description: Called when the system starts detecting sound in the input data.

events.name: onSoundEnd
events.description: Called when the system detects enough silence to consider the ongoing speech has ended.

events.name: onResult
events.description: Called when speech recognition results are available.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Object containing the speech recognition results.
